author: Ben Cohen
title: The Cavs Go Crazy at the NBA’s Trade Deadline
text:
The Cleveland Cavaliers weren’t good enough on Thursday morning to beat the Golden State Warriors in a playoff series. They weren’t good enough on Thursday morning to beat pretty much any NBA team with a pulse.
They were still in third place in the Eastern Conference with their 31-22 record, but they were closer to ninth place than second place. Their defense had slipped to nearly the worst in the entire league. Their players, coaches and executives were publicly sniping and making their locker room about as pleasant as the...
